p: Phenylpropanins have a wide range of biological activities, including antitumor, antivirus, liver protection, and antioxidation. For example, a variety of lignans in fruits of Schisandra chinensis have liver protective effects and can reduce serum alanine aminotransferase level. Schisandrae esteril A and its analogues have been used in the treatment of chronic hepatitis in China [ 18].
